entry.title: Game: Strider (GEN, 1989)
entry.content:
I've heard a lot about this game and I thought it would be an awesome action game like Ninja Gaiden, but with bigger and more beautiful graphics. I was totally wrong. This is super boring and the giant sprites do the gameplay a great dis-service by preventing you from seeing enough of the screen to do anything really effectively. I did not enjoy it.

Total time: 0:12
